ctl:test.name: wfs:run-GetFeature-POST
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: Run test group for GetFeature requests using the POST method. Target endpoint is {$wfs.GetCapabilities.document//ows:OperationsMetadata/ows:Operation[@name='GetFeature']/ows:DCP/ows:HTTP/ows:Post/@xlink:href}.

xsl:otherwise.ctl:message: PropertyIsBetween is not supported, skipping tests wfs:wfs-1.1.0-Basic-GetFeature-tc41.1 through 41.4.

test.name: wfs:wfs-1.1.0-Basic-GetFeature-tc1.1
test.assertion: The default output format is XML that complies with GML 3.1.1.
test.comment: GML 3.1.1 in this case is the GMLSF schema, for the level supported, 0 or 1. Pass if all of the following conditions are true: (1) the response is schema valid (for the GMLSF level supported); (2) the root document is an wfs:FeatureCollection document.

xsl:when.ctl:message: FAILURE: Missing or invalid response entity.

test.name: wfs:wfs-1.1.0-Basic-GetFeature-tc2.1
test.assertion: If @resultType='hits', then only the size of the resulting feature collection and a timestamp is returned (i.e. @numberOfFeatures, @timeStamp). Only instances of requested feature types are included in the total.
test.comment: GetFeature with resulttype of 'hits'. Pass if all of the following conditions are true: (1) the response is schema valid; (2) the root document is an wfs:FeatureCollection document; (3) there are no features in the response; (4) the numberOfFeatures and timeStamp attributes are present.

xsl:when.ctl:message: FAILURE: Missing or invalid response entity.

test.name: wfs:wfs-1.1.0-Basic-GetFeature-tc3.1
test.assertion: If @maxFeatures > 0, then the number of features included in the response shall not exceed the specified number. Members of a feature collection do NOT count toward the total.
test.comment: GetFeature with maxfeatures of '2'. Pass if all of the following conditions are true: (1) the response is schema valid; (2) the root document is an wfs:FeatureCollection document; (3) there are no more than the maxfeatures number of features in the response (and more than 0).

xsl:when.ctl:message: FAILURE: Missing or invalid response entity.

test.name: wfs:wfs-1.1.0-Basic-GetFeature-tc4.1
test.assertion: The @traverseXlinkDepth and @traverseXlinkExpiry attributes shall be ignored if the service does not implement the WFS-XLink conformance class.
test.comment: GetFeature with values for the traverseXlinkDepth and traverseXlinkExpiry parameters. If it is supported then it should give a correct response, and ignore if not supported. Pass if all of the following conditions are true: (1) the response is schema valid; (2) the root document is an wfs:FeatureCollection document.

xsl:when.ctl:message: FAILURE: Missing or invalid response entity.

test.name: wfs:wfs-1.1.0-Basic-GetFeature-tc5.1
test.assertion: The response entity must be schema valid and include any optional feature properties requested by the client. The document element must be a wfs:FeatureCollection.
test.comment: Pass if all of the following conditions are true: (1) the response is schema valid; (2) the root document is an wfs:FeatureCollection document.

xsl:when.ctl:message: FAILURE: Missing or invalid response entity.

test.name: wfs:wfs-1.1.0-Basic-GetFeature-tc5.2
test.assertion: The response entity must be schema valid and include any optional feature properties requested by the client. The document element must be a wfs:FeatureCollection.
test.comment: Looking for the optional property sf:dateProperty; other OPTIONAL elements (sf:uriProperty and sf:dateTimeProperty) should not be included in the response). Pass if all of the following conditions are true: (1) the response is schema valid; (2) the root document is an wfs:FeatureCollection document; (3) the response must have properties specified the propertyName(s) requested and no other optional properties.

xsl:when.ctl:message: FAILURE: Missing or invalid response entity.

xsl:if.ctl:message: FAILURE: Optional properties (sf:dateTimeProperty or sf:uriProperty) are included, but were not requested (gml:id = )

test.name: wfs:wfs-1.1.0-Basic-GetFeature-tc5.3
test.assertion: The response entity must be schema valid and include any optional feature properties requested by the client. The document element must be a wfs:FeatureCollection.
test.comment: Looking for the mandatory property sf:measurand, as well as other mandatory elements, (no optional properties should not be included in the response). Pass if all of the following conditions are true: (1) the response is schema valid; (2) the root document is an wfs:FeatureCollection document; (3) the response must have properties specified the propertyName(s) requested and no other optional properties.

xsl:when.ctl:message: FAILURE: Missing or invalid response entity.

test.name: wfs:wfs-1.1.0-Basic-GetFeature-tc6.1
test.assertion: The response entity must include the @xsi:schemaLocation attribute to identify the set of GML application schemas against which the matching features are valid.
test.comment: Pass if all of the following conditions are true: (1) the response is schema valid; (2) the root document is an wfs:FeatureCollection document; (3) the @xsi:schemaLocation parameter must be present.

xsl:when.ctl:message: FAILURE: Missing or invalid response entity.

xsl:if.ctl:message: FAILURE: Missing required attribute, wfs:FeatureCollection/@xsi:schemaLocation

test.name: wfs:wfs-1.1.0-Basic-GetFeature-tc7.1
test.assertion: The @featureVersion attribute shall be ignored if versioning is not supported.
test.comment: GetFeature with featureVersion of 'ALL'. Should ignore if not supported, or give the all versions of this feature. Pass if all of the following conditions are true: (1) the response is schema valid; (2) the root document is an wfs:FeatureCollection document.

xsl:when.ctl:message: FAILURE: Missing or invalid response entity.

test.name: wfs:wfs-1.1.0-Basic-GetFeature-tc9.1
test.assertion: If a request is unrecognizable or the service cannot process the request, a valid exception report must be returned.
test.comment: GetFeature with an incorrect typename ('sf:Asdf') in the query. Pass if all of the following conditions are true: (1) the response is schema valid; (2) the root document is an ows:ServiceException document.

xsl:when.ctl:message: FAILURE: Missing or invalid response entity.

test.name: wfs:wfs-1.1.0-Basic-GetFeature-tc9.2
test.assertion: If a request is unrecognizable or the service cannot process the request, a valid exception report must be returned.
test.comment: GetFeature with an incorrect propertyname ('sf:asdfProperty') requested in the query. Pass if all of the following conditions are true: (1) the response is schema valid; (2) the root document is an ows:ServiceException document.

xsl:when.ctl:message: FAILURE: Missing or invalid response entity.

test.name: wfs:wfs-1.1.0-Basic-GetFeature-tc11.1
test.assertion: The following attributes are required for all XML request entities: @version (default '1.1.0'); @service (default 'WFS').
test.comment: GetFeature with @version='1.1.0' and @service is an empty string (default of 'WFS'). Pass if all of the following conditions are true: (1) the response is schema valid; (2) the root document is an wfs:FeatureCollection document.

xsl:when.ctl:message: FAILURE: Missing or invalid response entity.

xsl:if.ctl:message: FAILURE: Expected 5 sf:PrimitiveGeoFeature instances in response ( were included)

test.name: wfs:wfs-1.1.0-Basic-GetFeature-tc11.2
test.assertion: The following attributes are required for all XML request entities: @version (default '1.1.0'); @service (default 'WFS').
test.comment: GetFeature with a version '1.1.0' and no @service (deduce from namespace). Pass if all of the following conditions are true: (1) the response is schema valid; (2) the root document is an wfs:FeatureCollection document.

xsl:when.ctl:message: FAILURE: Missing or invalid response entity.

xsl:if.ctl:message: FAILURE: Expected 5 sf:PrimitiveGeoFeature instances in response ( were included)

test.name: wfs:wfs-1.1.0-Basic-GetFeature-tc11.3
test.assertion: The following attributes are required for all XML request entities: @version (default '1.1.0'); @service (default 'WFS').
test.comment: GetFeature with no version and a service 'WFS', expecting version '1.1.0'. Pass if all of the following conditions are true: (1) the response is schema valid; (2) the root document is an wfs:FeatureCollection document.

xsl:when.ctl:message: FAILURE: Missing or invalid response entity.

xsl:if.ctl:message: FAILURE: Expected 5 sf:PrimitiveGeoFeature instances in response ( were included)

test.name: wfs:wfs-1.1.0-Basic-GetFeature-tc11.4
test.assertion: The following attributes are required for all XML request entities: @version (default '1.1.0'); @service (default 'WFS').
test.comment: GetFeature with @version an empty string and @service='WFS', expecting version '1.1.0'. Multiple versions may be implemented so generatees an exception. Pass if all of the following conditions are true: (1) the response is schema valid; (2) the root document is an wfs:FeatureCollection document.

xsl:when.ctl:message: FAILURE: Missing or invalid response entity.

xsl:if.ctl:message: FAILURE: Expected 5 sf:PrimitiveGeoFeature instances in response ( were included)

test.name: wfs:wfs-1.1.0-Basic-GetFeature-tc11.5
test.assertion: The following attributes are required for all XML request entities: @version (default '1.1.0'); @service (default 'WFS').
test.comment: GetFeature with a version of '1.1.0' and a bogus service of 'FOO'. Pass if all of the following conditions are true: (1) the response is schema valid; (2) the root document is an ows:ExceptionReport document.

xsl:when.ctl:message: FAILURE: Missing or invalid response entity.

test.name: wfs:wfs-1.1.0-Basic-GetFeature-tc11.6
test.assertion: The following attributes are required for all XML request entities: @version (default '1.1.0'); @service (default 'WFS').
test.comment: GetFeature with a bogus version of '2005.05.03' and a service of 'WFS'. Pass if all of the following conditions are true: (1) the response is schema valid; (2) the root document is an ows:ExceptionReport document.

xsl:when.ctl:message: FAILURE: Missing or invalid response entity.

test.name: wfs:wfs-1.1.0-Basic-GetFeature-tc12.1
test.assertion: The Content-Type of all XML request entities must be 'application/xml'.
test.comment: GetFeature with the encoding as 'application/xml' (default). Pass if all of the following conditions are true: (1) the response is schema valid; (2) the root document is a wfs:FeatureCollection document.

xsl:when.ctl:message: FAILURE: Missing or invalid response entity.

test.name: wfs:wfs-1.1.0-Basic-GetFeature-tc13.1
test.assertion: The @typeName attribute must identify a list of known feature types. Aliases may be declared for use in a filter expression.
test.comment: GetFeature with a known typename in the query (from test data). Note: no lists to be used as they are to be phased out in 1.2.0. Pass if all of the following conditions are true: (1) the response is schema valid; (2) the root document is a wfs:FeatureCollection document; (3) there must be at least the requested features in the response.

xsl:when.ctl:message: FAILURE: Missing or invalid response entity.

test.name: wfs:wfs-1.1.0-Basic-GetFeature-tc13.2
test.assertion: The @typeName attribute must identify a list of known feature types. Aliases may be declared for use in a filter expression.
test.comment: GetFeature with an unknown typename in the query. Pass if all of the following conditions are true: (1) the response is schema valid; (2) the root document is a ows:ExceptionReport document.

xsl:when.ctl:message: FAILURE: Missing or invalid response entity.

test.name: wfs:wfs-1.1.0-Basic-GetFeature-tc14.1
test.assertion: The geometry representations in the response must correspond to the CRS specified in the @srsName attribute, or the service default if not specified or unknown. Use values as recommended in RFC 5165 (e.g. 'urn:ogc:def:crs:EPSG:6.10.2:4326').
test.comment: GetFeature with the srs 'urn:ogc:def:crs:EPSG::4326'. Pass if all of the following conditions are true: (1) the response is schema valid; (2) the root document is a wfs:FeatureCollection document; (3) the response srs must be that which was requested.

xsl:when.ctl:message: FAILURE: Missing or invalid response entity.

xsl:if.ctl:message: FAILURE: Expected 5 sf:PrimitiveGeoFeature instances in response ( were included)

test.name: wfs:wfs-1.1.0-Basic-GetFeature-tc14.2
test.assertion: The geometry representations in the response must correspond to the CRS specified in the @srsName attribute, or the service default if not specified or unknown. Use values as recommended in RFC 5165 (e.g. 'urn:ogc:def:crs:EPSG:6.10.2:4326').
test.comment: GetFeature with the bogus srs 'urn:ogc:def:crs:EPSG:9.99.9:99999'. Pass if all of the following conditions are true: (1) the response is schema valid; (2) the root document is a ows:ExceptionReport document.

xsl:when.ctl:message: FAILURE: Missing or invalid response entity.

test.name: wfs:wfs-1.1.0-Basic-GetFeature-tc15.1
test.assertion: The resulting feature collection must contain only those features that satisfy the specified constraints, or all instances of the requested types if no filter expression is provided.
test.comment: GetFeature looking for a feature by gml:name. Pass if all of the following conditions are true: (1) the response is schema valid; (2) the root document is a wfs:FeatureCollection document; (3) the response must contain the feature requested.

xsl:when.ctl:message: FAILURE: Missing or invalid response entity.

test.name: wfs:wfs-1.1.0-Basic-GetFeature-tc15.2
test.assertion: The resulting feature collection must contain only those features that satisfy the specified constraints, or all instances of the requested types if no filter expression is provided.
test.comment: GetFeature looking for all feature with all properties except sf:uriProperty. Pass if all of the following conditions are true: (1) the response is schema valid; (2) the root document is a wfs:FeatureCollection document; (3) the response must contain the features requested; (4) the result features must not contain any optional properties not specified in the propertyNames of the request.

xsl:when.ctl:message: FAILURE: Missing or invalid response entity.

test.name: wfs:wfs-1.1.0-Basic-GetFeature-tc15.3
test.assertion: The resulting feature collection must contain only those features that satisfy the specified constraints, or all instances of the requested types if no filter expression is provided.
test.comment: GetFeature looking for a feature by type (sf:PrimitiveGeoFeature and sf:EntitGnrique). Pass if all of the following conditions are true: (1) the response is schema valid; (2) the root document is a wfs:FeatureCollection document; (3) the response must only contain the features requested.

xsl:when.ctl:message: FAILURE: Missing or invalid response entity.

test.name: wfs:wfs-1.1.0-Basic-GetFeature-tc16.1
test.assertion: All OGC web services must generate an exception report in response to an invalid request or whenever a condition arises that prevents request processing. A valid XML response entity must conform to the declaration of the ows:ExceptionReport element. The values of common information items must be constrained as indicated in Tables 17-19. Additional service-specific exception codes may be defined as needed.
test.comment: GetFeature with a bogus version '11-02-2006', causing the InvalidParameterValue exception. Pass if all of the following conditions are true: (1) the response is schema valid; (2) the root document is a ows:ExceptionReport document; (3) the exception must have the 'OperationNotSupported' exception code; (4) the exception must have the @locator value of the unsupported operation ('GetFeature').

xsl:when.ctl:message: FAILURE: Missing or invalid response entity.

xsl:if.ctl:message: FAILURE: ows:Exception/@locator is absent or does not identify the invalid version attribute.

test.name: wfs:wfs-1.1.0-Basic-GetFeature-tc16.2
test.assertion: All OGC web services must generate an exception report in response to an invalid request or whenever a condition arises that prevents request processing. A valid XML response entity must conform to the declaration of the ows:ExceptionReport element. The values of common information items must be constrained as indicated in Tables 17-19. Additional service-specific exception codes may be defined as needed.
test.comment: GetFeature with a bogus operation 'GetFeatureLOL', causing the OperationNotSupprted exception. Pass if all of the following conditions are true: (1) the response is schema valid; (2) the root document is a ows:ExceptionReport document; (3) the exception must have the 'OperationNotSupported' exception code; (4) the exception must have the @locator value of the unsupported operation ('GetFeatureLOL').

xsl:when.ctl:message: FAILURE: Missing or invalid response entity.

test.name: wfs:wfs-1.1.0-Basic-GetFeature-tc16.3
test.assertion: All OGC web services must generate an exception report in response to an invalid request or whenever a condition arises that prevents request processing. A valid XML response entity must conform to the declaration of the ows:ExceptionReport element. The values of common information items must be constrained as indicated in Tables 17-19. Additional service-specific exception codes may be defined as needed.
test.comment: GetFeature with query element in the incorrect namespace, causing the MissingParameterValue exception. Pass if all of the following conditions are true: (1) the response is schema valid; (2) the root document is a ows:ExceptionReport document; (3) the exception must have the 'MissingParameterValue' exception code.

xsl:when.ctl:message: FAILURE: Missing or invalid response entity.

test.name: wfs:wfs-1.1.0-Basic-GetFeature-tc16.4
test.assertion: All OGC web services must generate an exception report in response to an invalid request or whenever a condition arises that prevents request processing. A valid XML response entity must conform to the declaration of the ows:ExceptionReport element. The values of common information items must be constrained as indicated in Tables 17-19. Additional service-specific exception codes may be defined as needed.
test.comment: GetFeature with a bogus 'Smuery' element, causing the InvalidParameterValue exception. Pass if all of the following conditions are true: (1) the response is schema valid; (2) the root document is a ows:ExceptionReport document; (3) the exception must have the 'InvalidParameterValue' exception code.

xsl:when.ctl:message: FAILURE: Missing or invalid response entity.

test.name: wfs:wfs-1.1.0-Basic-GetFeature-tc17.1
test.assertion: A reference to a coordinate reference system (CRS) shall be a URI value that conforms to a known URI scheme. Provide a URL for definitions that can be accessed from an online source; otherwise provide a URN that SHOULD conform to the syntax described in RFC 5165.
test.comment: GetFeature with the srs as a URN. Pass if all of the following conditions are true: (1) the response is schema valid; (2) the root document is a wfs:FeatureCollection document; (3) the response must use the srs that was requested.

xsl:when.ctl:message: FAILURE: Missing or invalid response entity.

test.name: wfs:wfs-1.1.0-Basic-GetFeature-tc17.2
test.assertion: A reference to a coordinate reference system (CRS) shall be a URI value that conforms to a known URI scheme. Provide a URL for definitions that can be accessed from an online source; otherwise provide a URN that SHOULD conform to the syntax described in RFC 5165.
test.comment: GetFeature with the srs as a URI (not valid, only as a URN). Pass if all of the following conditions are true: (1) the response is schema valid; (2) the root document is a ows:ExceptionReport document.

xsl:when.ctl:message: FAILURE: Missing or invalid response entity.

test.name: wfs:wfs-1.1.0-Basic-GetFeature-tc18.1
test.assertion: The Content-Type of all POST KVP-encoded request entities must be 'application/x-www-form-urlencoded'.
test.comment: GetFeature KVP over POST, with the request encoded as 'application/x-www-form-urlencoded'. Pass if all of the following conditions are true: (1) the response is schema valid; (2) the root document is a wfs:FeatureCollection document.

xsl:when.ctl:message: FAILURE: Missing or invalid response entity.

test.name: wfs:wfs-1.1.0-Basic-GetFeature-tc19.1
test.assertion: Qualified property names must conform to the QName production rule defined in the Namespaces in XML specification http://www.w3.org/TR/REC-xml-names/. QName ::= (Prefix ':')? LocalPart.
test.comment: GetFeature with a properly qualified property name 'gml:name'. Pass if all of the following conditions are true: (1) the response is schema valid; (2) the root document is a wfs:FeatureCollection document; (3) the response must contain the feature that was requested.

xsl:when.ctl:message: FAILURE: Missing or invalid response entity.

test.name: wfs:wfs-1.1.0-Basic-GetFeature-tc19.2
test.assertion: Qualified property names must conform to the QName production rule defined in the Namespaces in XML specification http://www.w3.org/TR/REC-xml-names/. QName ::= (Prefix ':')? LocalPart.
test.comment: GetFeature with a properly qualified property name 'gml:name', yet an incorrect namespace binding for gml casuing an exception. Pass if all of the following conditions are true: (1) the response is schema valid; (2) the root document is a ows:ExceptionReport document.

xsl:when.ctl:message: FAILURE: Missing or invalid response entity.

test.name: wfs:wfs-1.1.0-Basic-GetFeature-tc20.1
test.assertion: A valid filter expression must conform to the content model declared for the ogc:Filter element.
test.comment: GetFeature with a proper filter element'. Pass if all of the following conditions are true: (1) the response is schema valid; (2) the root document is a wfs:FeatureCollection document; (3) the response must contain the features that were requested (one or more).

xsl:when.ctl:message: FAILURE: Missing or invalid response entity.

test.name: wfs:wfs-1.1.0-Basic-GetFeature-tc21.1
test.assertion: XPath 1.0 shall be used to address parts of an XML representation using ogc:PropertyName. Support for the AbbreviatedRelativeLocationPath construct is required; the position() function may appear in a predicate to refer to a child node by position relative to the context node.
test.comment: GetFeature using the abbreviated local path predicate. Pass if all of the following conditions are true: (1) the response is schema valid; (2) the root document is a wfs:FeatureCollection document; (3) the response must contain the feature that was requested.

xsl:when.ctl:message: FAILURE: Missing or invalid response entity.

test.name: wfs:wfs-1.1.0-Basic-GetFeature-tc21.2
test.assertion: XPath 1.0 shall be used to address parts of an XML representation using ogc:PropertyName. Support for the AbbreviatedRelativeLocationPath construct is required; the position() function may appear in a predicate to refer to a child node by position relative to the context node.
test.comment: GetFeature with a filter using the simplified position predicate ('[n]'). Pass if all of the following conditions are true: (1) the response is schema valid; (2) the root document is an wfs:FeatureCollection document; (3) the requested feature is in the response as expected.

xsl:when.ctl:message: FAILURE: Missing or invalid response entity.

test.name: wfs:wfs-1.1.0-Basic-GetFeature-tc21.3
test.assertion: XPath 1.0 shall be used to address parts of an XML representation using ogc:PropertyName. Support for the AbbreviatedRelativeLocationPath construct is required; the position() function may appear in a predicate to refer to a child node by position relative to the context node.
test.comment: GetFeature with a filter using the position predicate ('[position()==1]'). Pass if all of the following conditions are true: (1) the response is schema valid; (2) the root document is an wfs:FeatureCollection document; (3) the requested feature is in the response as expected.

xsl:when.ctl:message: FAILURE: Missing or invalid response entity.

test.name: wfs:wfs-1.1.0-Basic-GetFeature-tc22.1
test.assertion: An ogc:Literal element may include simple or complex content. If a child element appears it may belong to any target namespace, but a top-level declaration for the item must be available.
test.comment: GetFeature with a literal value of type string ('description-f02'). Pass if all of the following conditions are true: (1) the response is schema valid; (2) the root document is an wfs:FeatureCollection document; (3) the requested feature is in the response as expected.

xsl:when.ctl:message: FAILURE: Missing or invalid response entity.

test.name: wfs:wfs-1.1.0-Basic-GetFeature-tc22.2
test.assertion: An ogc:Literal element may include simple or complex content. If a child element appears it may belong to any target namespace, but a top-level declaration for the item must be available.
test.comment: GetFeature with a literal value of complex type. No features are expected, but no exception either. Pass if all of the following conditions are true: (1) the response is schema valid; (2) the root document is an wfs:FeatureCollection document; (3) the response should have no feature members.

xsl:when.ctl:message: FAILURE: Missing or invalid response entity.

test.name: wfs:wfs-1.1.0-Basic-GetFeature-tc25.1
test.assertion: An unsupported CRS shall generate an exception report.
test.comment: GetFeature with a a bogus CRS 'urn:ogc:def:crs:ASDF:9.99:9999'. Pass if all of the following conditions are true: (1) the response is schema valid; (2) the root document is an ows:ExceptionReport document.

xsl:when.ctl:message: FAILURE: Missing or invalid response entity.

test.name: wfs:wfs-1.1.0-Basic-GetFeature-tc27.1
test.assertion: The ogc:PropertyName element in any spatial predicate must refer to a geometry-valued property and the supplied literal geometry value must be in the gml:_Geometry substitution group.
test.comment: GetFeature with a spatial property name, on a BBOX query. Pass if all of the following conditions are true: (1) the response is schema valid; (2) the root document is an wfs:FeatureCollection document; (3) the response should have the requested features.

xsl:when.ctl:message: FAILURE: Missing or invalid response entity.

xsl:if.ctl:message: FAILURE: Expected one sf:PrimitiveGeoFeature instance in response ( features included)
FAILURE: Missing feature (gml:name="name-f002").

test.name: wfs:wfs-1.1.0-Basic-GetFeature-tc27.2
test.assertion: The ogc:PropertyName element in any spatial predicate must refer to a geometry-valued property and the supplied literal geometry value must be in the gml:_Geometry substitution group.
test.comment: GetFeature with an integer property name, on a BBOX query, causing an exception. Pass if all of the following conditions are true: (1) the response is schema valid; (2) the root document is an ows:ExceptionReport document.

xsl:when.ctl:message: FAILURE: Missing or invalid response entity.

test.name: wfs:wfs-1.1.0-Basic-GetFeature-tc28.1
test.assertion: If the @srsName of the supplied literal geometry or gml:Envelope is unspecified, it shall be handled as if it corresponded to the advertised default CRS.
test.comment: GetFeature spatial query, with no srsName specified, the default is expected (from the capabilities document). Pass if all of the following conditions are true: (1) the response is schema valid; (2) the root document is an wfs:FeatureCollection document; (3) the response shall use the default srs value from the capabilities document.

xsl:when.ctl:message: FAILURE: Missing or invalid response entity.

xsl:if.ctl:message: FAILURE: Missing feature (gml:name="name-f001").
FAILURE: @srsName="" does not match expected DefaultSRS ()

test.name: wfs:wfs-1.1.0-Basic-GetFeature-tc29.1
test.assertion: Correctly evaluate the BBOX predicate (equivalent to ogc:Intersects with a gml:Envelope argument) expressed by a valid ogc:BBOX element
test.comment: GetFeature spatial query for a BBOX around a feature. Pass if all of the following conditions are true: (1) the response is schema valid; (2) the root document is an wfs:FeatureCollection document; (3) the response shall have the feature member expected from the request.

xsl:when.ctl:message: FAILURE: Missing or invalid response entity.

test.name: wfs:wfs-1.1.0-Basic-GetFeature-tc29.2
test.assertion: Correctly evaluate the BBOX predicate (equivalent to ogc:Intersects with a gml:Envelope argument) expressed by a valid ogc:BBOX element
test.comment: GetFeature spatial query for a BBOX touching a feature. Pass if all of the following conditions are true: (1) the response is schema valid; (2) the root document is an wfs:FeatureCollection document; (3) the response shall have the feature member expected from the request.

xsl:when.ctl:message: FAILURE: Missing or invalid response entity.

test.name: wfs:wfs-1.1.0-Basic-GetFeature-tc29.3
test.assertion: Correctly evaluate the BBOX predicate (equivalent to ogc:Intersects with a gml:Envelope argument) expressed by a valid ogc:BBOX element
test.comment: GetFeature spatial query for a BBOX with no features in it (0,0 0.01,0.01). Pass if all of the following conditions are true: (1) the response is schema valid; (2) the root document is an wfs:FeatureCollection document; (3) the response shall not have any feature members.

xsl:when.ctl:message: FAILURE: Missing or invalid response entity.

test.name: wfs:wfs-1.1.0-Basic-GetFeature-tc29.4
test.assertion: Correctly evaluate the BBOX predicate (equivalent to ogc:Intersects with a gml:Envelope argument) expressed by a valid ogc:BBOX element
test.comment: GetFeature spatial query for a BBOX around a number of different feature. Pass if all of the following conditions are true: (1) the response is schema valid; (2) the root document is an wfs:FeatureCollection document; (3) the response shall have the exact number of features in that BBOX requested.

xsl:when.ctl:message: FAILURE: Missing or invalid response entity.

xsl:if.ctl:message: FAILURE: Expected at least one sf:PrimitiveGeoFeature instance in response
FAILURE: Expected at least one sf:EntitGnrique instance in response
FAILURE: Expected at least one sf:AggregateGeoFeature instances in response

test.name: wfs:wfs-1.1.0-Basic-GetFeature-tc33.1
test.assertion: The ogc:GmlObjectId/@gml:id attribute shall be used to identify a GML3-based object representation.
test.comment: GetFeature to first get a feature id (gml:id), then another GetFeature filtering on the gml:id. Pass if all of the following conditions are true: (1) the response is schema valid; (2) the root document is an wfs:FeatureCollection document; (3) the response shall have the feature member expected from the request.

xsl:when.ctl:message: FAILURE: Expected valid wfs:FeatureCollection.
FAILURE: Missing or invalid response entity.

xsl:if.ctl:message: FAILURE: Expected gml:id = (received )

test.name: wfs:wfs-1.1.0-Basic-GetFeature-tc34.1
test.assertion: A filter expression may include only one type of identifier element.
test.comment: GetFeature with a filter on two different Id predicates (GmlObjectId and FeatureId), causing an exception. Pass if all of the following conditions are true: (1) the response is schema valid; (2) the root document is an ows:ExceptionReport document.

xsl:when.ctl:message: FAILURE: Missing or invalid response entity.

test.name: wfs:wfs-1.1.0-Basic-GetFeature-tc35.1
test.assertion: Correctly evaluate the PropertyIsEqualTo predicate expressed by a valid ogc:PropertyIsEqualTo element.
test.comment: PropertyIsEqualTo filter request, for a string-type property on sf:strProperty, expecting at least one match (case sensitive). Pass if all of the following conditions are true: (1) the response is schema valid; (2) the number of result features is >= 1; (3) the result feature set contains the expected feature instance.

xsl:when.ctl:message: FAILURE: Missing or invalid response entity.

xsl:if.ctl:message: FAILURE: Expected one sf:AggregateGeoFeature instance in response ( features included)

ctl:test.name: wfs:wfs-1.1.0-Basic-GetFeature-tc45.1
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: The response to a GetFeature request that includes an ogc:Filter expression with a PropertyIsNull predicate must include only feature representations for which the specified property is either absent or has no value. Mandatory properties cannot be null.
ctl:test.ctl:comment: Pass if the response entity is a valid wfs:FeatureCollection that contains only feature members satisfying the PropertyIsNull constraint.

xsl:when.ctl:message: FAILURE: Missing or invalid response entity.

xsl:if.ctl:message: FAILURE: Empty response
FAILURE: sf:uriProperty value is not null (gml:id = )

ctl:test.name: wfs:wfs-1.1.0-Basic-GetFeature-tc45.2
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: The response to a GetFeature request that includes an ogc:Filter expression with a PropertyIsNull predicate must include only feature representations for which the specified property is either absent or has no value. Mandatory properties cannot be null.
ctl:test.ctl:comment: Pass if the response entity is an empty wfs:FeatureCollection.

xsl:when.ctl:message: FAILURE: Missing or invalid response entity.

xsl:if.ctl:message: FAILURE: Mandatory properties cannot be null. Expected empty response ( features included)
FAILURE: sf:intProperty cannot be null (gml:id = )

ctl:test.name: wfs:wfs-1.1.0-Basic-GetFeature-tc45.3
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: The response to a GetFeature request that includes an ogc:Filter expression with a PropertyIsNull predicate must include only feature representations for which the specified property is either absent or has no value. Mandatory properties cannot be null.
ctl:test.ctl:comment: Pass if the response entity is a valid wfs:FeatureCollection that contains only feature members satisfying the PropertyIsNull constraint.

xsl:when.ctl:message: FAILURE: Missing or invalid response entity.

xsl:if.ctl:message: FAILURE: Empty response
FAILURE: sf:multiCurveProperty value is not null (missing) (gml:id = )

test.name: wfs:wfs-1.1.0-Basic-GetFeature-tc49.1
test.assertion: If the @srsName of the supplied literal geometry or gml:Envelope is supported, then the coordinate values in the response shall correspond to that CRS.
test.comment: GetFeature spatial query, with an srsName specified (default), and the response should use the requested SRS. Pass if all of the following conditions are true: (1) the response is schema valid; (2) the root document is an wfs:FeatureCollection document; (3) the response shall use the default srs value requested.

xsl:when.ctl:message: FAILURE: Missing or invalid response entity.

xsl:if.ctl:message: FAILURE: Empty response
FAILURE: @srsName="" does not match expected value ("urn:ogc:def:crs:EPSG::4326")

test.name: wfs:wfs-1.1.0-Basic-GetFeature-tc51.1
test.assertion: When the SortBy parameter is used the resulting feature set must be properly sorted according to the sort criteria.
test.comment: GetFeature for all PrimitiveGeoFeature sorting by the intProperty in ascending order. Pass if all of the following conditions are true: (1) the response is schema valid; (2) the root document is an wfs:FeatureCollection document; (3) the response shall have the features sorted by the proper feature property in the described ascending or descending manner.

xsl:when.ctl:message: [FAILURE] Expected wfs:FeatureCollection in response.

xsl:if.ctl:message: [FAILURE] Features are not sorted by sf:intProperty in ascending order.

test.name: wfs:wfs-1.1.0-Basic-GetFeature-tc51.2
test.assertion: When the SortBy parameter is used the resulting feature set must be properly sorted according to the sort criteria.
test.comment: GetFeature for all PrimitiveGeoFeature sorting by the intProperty in descending order. Pass if all of the following conditions are true: (1) the response is schema valid; (2) the root document is an wfs:FeatureCollection document; (3) the response shall have the features sorted by the proper feature property in the described ascending or descending manner.

xsl:when.ctl:message: [FAILURE] Expected wfs:FeatureCollection in response.

xsl:if.ctl:message: FAILURE: Features are not sorted by sf:intProperty in descending order.
